Title: Kaddish
Plot: Issac Luria, a Jewish man, is killed by a group of teenagers working for a racist shop owner, but one of them is soon strangled to death, and the fingerprints on his neck are from Issac. Despite other factors, Mulder becomes convinced that the man has returned from the dead to exact revenge.
GuestStars: Justine Miceli, David Groh, Harrison Coe, Jabin Litwiniec, David Wohl, Jonathan Whittaker, Timur Karabilgin, George Gordon, Murrey Rabinovitch, David Freeman, Channon Roe
